welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Welby, known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly community. We invite you to explore our city and soak in all its beauty. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Arapahoe Co Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Arapahoe Co Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Jeffco Airport houses all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Jeffco Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Jeppesen Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Denver International Airport, named after aviation pioneer Elrey B. Jeppesen.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: One of three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: One of three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: One of three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
